entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Islet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 15 cm except 10 cm near the river. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
